amendment.description: To increase the amount appropriated for firefighter assistance grants.

action.text: Amendment SA 3624 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3624 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 45. Record Vote Number: 175.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3624.
Amendment SA 3624 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S9108-9110; text: CR S9108) To increase the amount appropriated for firefighter assistance grants.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3624 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 45. Record Vote Number: 175.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3624 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
